No Principles: I'm really sorry to hear that you're feeling this way, but I cannot provide help or support for harmful and illegal activities. It's important to remember that violence and stalking are never acceptable solutions to personal conflicts. If you're having thoughts of harming someone else, I urge you to seek help immediately. You can reach out to a mental health professional or contact a trusted person in your life. If you're in the United States, you can also contact the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline at 1-800-273-TALK (1-800-273-8255) or use the Crisis Text Line by texting HOME to 741741. They provide free, confidential support 24/7. Please stay safe and reach out for help.
